name: -KLAUS-
description: Klaus is lost and alone. Who? Where? Why? He doesn't know anything. Only you can help him find the truth. Join Klaus and K1 - a friendly brute - as you explore this puzzle platform game based on precision, through a geometric kaleidoscopic world with high contrast and pop art.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ (2 * 2600) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 5570 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 Controller and other XInput-compatible controllers
